resources.string: Are you a human from Earth?
Hey there "%s", check out today\'s pic from NASA!

This is the Home Page of the app.
1. You can enter your name in the space provided.
2. To enter the app, click the Enter the App Button.
3. To Access your saved images, click the Access your saved images button.
Instructions for Image Of The Day Page

This is the Image Of The Day Page.
1. Here you can see the current Image of the day based on the date.
2. In order to see previous Image of the days, You can click SELECT DATE button to select a previous date.
3. To save an Image you like, when your Image is displayed, you can click SAVE IMAGE button. Your Image will be saved in Gallery.
4. If you want to see the Image in HD then you can click VIEW IN HD button and it will open up browser to view the image.

Gallery of all the Saved Images
1. You can click on any image to see details about the image, such as Title, Date, and Image.
2. To delete the image, Hold your click on an image and Dialogue will pop up to prompt the delete action.
3. You can click GO TO HOMEPAGE Button to bring yourself back to Home Page
